comment.author: 56789833@N07
comment._content:
Check the date on this - 1893? Likely to be June 1886 and the aftermath of the Tarawera eruption of 10 June 1886.
The bottom photo looks like Lake Rotorua, Mokoia Island in centre, in the gloom post-eruption.

comment.author: 92580833@N07
comment._content: further, the earlier photos of the Pink Terraces I suspect predate these pics, because the Tarawera eruption covered them in, & therefore are unlikely to be 1923 as stated.
